entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.FileStreamFlushAsyncThreadPoolDeadlockTest test timeout #79200
  • Make LINQ providers (Queryable) compatible with NativeAOT #79199
  • How do I keep the Query parameter of the System.Uri in lower case #79198

Closed

  • Wrong version for System.Text.Json in nuget package? #78754
  • .NET Framework golink now leads to nowhere #79203
  • [NativeAOT] AOT-compiled applications in release mode include debug information #79197
  • AOT warning emitted for code inside RuntimeFeature.IsDynamicCodeSupported check #79201
  • Improve Networking docs #76661
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle local address nodes in `GenTree::Compare` #79202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix typos #79136
    area-Meta, community-contribution

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reserve memory for FOH in-range #78292
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allocate static boxes on FOH #2 #79188
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Speed up `Matrix4x4.CreateScale` #79172
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fold all local addresses in local morph #79194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify Interlocked.CompareExchange and Interlocked.Exchange for null #79181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Speeds up linker tests in NativeAOT #79176
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Documentation signature parser tests and fixes for NativeAOT #79168
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Put back setting of field in DirectorySearcher.FindAll #79192
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [release/6.0] Put back setting of field in DirectorySearcher.FindAll #79191
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
